content.body: Is it just me (not on the call), but when the chat dies out suddenly, do you wonder if Matrix just tipped over or was there a break?

Syntactically correct TypeScript will emit JS even if the type checks fail.  (And sometimes it will emit JS even if the syntax is invalid.)

content.body: My favourite is automatic brace insertion in ts.

content.body: (sorry this is a distraction from current topic - it should be in TDZ)

content.formatted_body:
if you write

if (x) {
//forgot a brace here

TypeScript gracefully parses, tells you you forgot a brace, and just re-prints it the right way

if (x) {
}
